content: free version of this pattern available on my blog https //www sweetsofties com/2024/06/leggy-teddy html the leggy teddy is an adorable no-sew bear pattern that works up quickly and easily this portable pocket-sized friend is 5 5 inches tall and perfect for children to take on the go this mini amigurumi is designed with super bulky velvet chenille yarn but can be made using medium weight 4 or dk yarn to create a smaller keychain version it s a gender neutral and unisex toy that can be gifted to boys and girls and make great presents for kids birthdays christmas holiday as party favors or as craft fair products they can also be worry dolls to ease nerves and anxiety make them for children with autism sensory needs or other special needs to calm down and self-regulate by holding onto it and practicing breathing the pdf pattern includes progress photos to help guide you through the doll making process **size** height 5 5 inches **materials** super bulky weight 6 yarn in brown i used hobbii baby snuggle yarn 5mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes x2 light brown felt scrap for muzzle thread for embroidering nose/mouth sewing needle stuffing scissors optional appliques for embellishment such as a bow flower or buttons **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below **stitches & techniques us terms ** fo = fasten_off yo = yarn over chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together *copyright
